remarks: The group operation of the symmetric group on ` A ` is closed, i.e. a magma.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jan-2015.)
statement:
symgplusg.1 $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) $.
symgplusg.2 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
symgplusg.3 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
symgcl $p |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. B ) $.
